item.title: Ask Tame Impala - My First Web App
item.description:
My First App is Live!

Try it out here: tameimpala.pythonanywhere.com

What It Does

Ask it a question, and it queries a database of Tame Impala lyrics and pulls a response line from the lyrics based on which words match up. Kevin Parker is the frontman of the band â€¦
item.dc:creator: pythonmarketer
